## Statistics.addTimer() method

Adds the timer specified.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
addTimer(timer: Timer): Timer;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  timer | [Timer](./harp-mapview.timer.md) | The timer's name, which must be unique within this statistics object. |

<b>Returns:</b>

[Timer](./harp-mapview.timer.md)
